# Plot node weight evolution

## Prepare libraries

```{r}
# load libs
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
library(patchwork)
library(colorspace)
```

## Load data

```{r}
# read back in
data <- fread("data/results/data_weight_evolution.csv")

# handle weight value ranges and use UPPER bound
data[, weight_num := 
       stringi::stri_extract_last(weight_value, 
                                  regex = "[-0-9]+\\.\\d{2}")]
# assign numeric
data[, weight_num := as.numeric(weight_num)]
```
